text: oh, no, no, you have it wrong. no. i, i was going to be a jackass, but i stopped myself. i stayed a good guy, so, i'm gonna pass on the sex. but you should know, that's not a comment on your hotness but on my goodness. that's kind of my superpower. i'm, like, captain good guy.
